text: kinect bracket is installed. it tilts a little past 90 so should cover the sandbox. Hopefully dropping it 1-2 inches didn't reduce its field of view too much. you can loosen/tighten the 1/4-20 allen head cap screws to adjust drag on rotation. Once it's in a good place we can lock it in place with those too.
awesome thanks <@U02F8LF2X>! I'll check out its field of view in a bit and see if any adjustments are needed
